spirit:vendorExtensions.actel-cc:script: Enable('ADVANCED_OPTION', Eq('PARAM_IS_FALSE', '1'));\ Enable('RXD_CONNECTION', Eq(ValueOf('MODE_DUPLEX'), 'MODE_FULL'));\ Set('RXD_CONNECTION', Eq(ValueOf('MODE_DUPLEX'), 'MODE_HALF'), '0');\ Enable('RXD_FAB_CAPT', And(Eq(ValueOf('RXD_CONNECTION'), 'CONNECTION_IO'), Eq(ValueOf('MODE_DUPLEX'), 'MODE_FULL')));\ Set('RXD_FAB_CAPT', Or(Eq(ValueOf('RXD_CONNECTION'), 'CONNECTION_FABRIC'), Eq(ValueOf('MODE_DUPLEX'), 'MODE_HALF')), '0');\ Enable('RXD_GPIO_CAPT', Eq(ValueOf('MODE_DUPLEX'), 'MODE_FULL'));\ Set('RXD_GPIO_CAPT', Eq(ValueOf('MODE_DUPLEX'), 'MODE_HALF'), '0');\ Enable('TXD_CONNECTION', Eq(ValueOf('MODE_DUPLEX'), 'MODE_FULL'));\ Set('TXD_CONNECTION', Eq(ValueOf('MODE_DUPLEX'), 'MODE_HALF'), '0');\ Enable('TXD_FAB_CAPT', And(Eq(ValueOf('TXD_CONNECTION'), 'CONNECTION_IO'), Eq(ValueOf('MODE_DUPLEX'), 'MODE_FULL')));\ Set('TXD_FAB_CAPT', Or(Eq(ValueOf('TXD_CONNECTION'), 'CONNECTION_FABRIC'), Eq(ValueOf('MODE_DUPLEX'), 'MODE_HALF')), '0');\ Enable('TXD_GPIO_CAPT', Eq('PARAM_IS_FALSE', '1'));\ Enable('TXD_RXD_CONNECTION', Eq(ValueOf('MODE_DUPLEX'), 'MODE_HALF'));\ Set('TXD_RXD_CONNECTION', Eq(ValueOf('MODE_DUPLEX'), 'MODE_FULL'), '0');\ Enable('TXD_RXD_FAB_CAPT', And(Eq(ValueOf('TXD_RXD_CONNECTION'), 'CONNECTION_IO'), Eq(ValueOf('MODE_DUPLEX'), 'MODE_HALF')));\ Set('TXD_RXD_FAB_CAPT', Or(Eq(ValueOf('TXD_RXD_CONNECTION'), 'CONNECTION_FABRIC'), Eq(ValueOf('MODE_DUPLEX'), 'MODE_FULL')), '0');\ Enable('TXD_RXD_GPIO_CAPT', Eq(ValueOf('MODE_DUPLEX'), 'MODE_HALF'));\ Set('TXD_RXD_GPIO_CAPT', Eq(ValueOf('MODE_DUPLEX'), 'MODE_FULL'), '0');\ Enable('CLK_CONNECTION', Eq(ValueOf('MODE'), 'MODE_SYNC'));\ Set('CLK_CONNECTION', Eq(ValueOf('MODE'), 'MODE_ASYNC'), '0');\ Enable('CLK_FAB_CAPT', And(Eq(ValueOf('CLK_CONNECTION'), 'CONNECTION_IO'), Eq(ValueOf('MODE'), 'MODE_SYNC')));\ Set('CLK_FAB_CAPT', Or(Eq(ValueOf('RXD_CONNECTION'), 'CONNECTION_FABRIC'), Eq(ValueOf('MODE'), 'MODE_ASYNC')), '0');\ Enable('CLK_GPIO_CAPT', Eq(ValueOf('MODE'), 'MODE_SYNC'));\ Set('CLK_GPIO_CAPT', Eq(ValueOf('MODE'), 'MODE_ASYNC'), '0');\ Enable('RTS_CONNECTION', Eq('USE_MODEM', '1'));\ Enable('RTS_FAB_CAPT', And(Eq(ValueOf('RTS_CONNECTION'), 'CONNECTION_IO'), 'USE_MODEM'));\ Set('RTS_FAB_CAPT', Or(Neq(ValueOf('RTS_CONNECTION'), 'CONNECTION_IO'), Eq('USE_MODEM', '0')), '0');\ Enable('RTS_GPIO_CAPT', Eq('PARAM_IS_FALSE', '1'));\ Enable('DTR_CONNECTION', Eq('USE_MODEM', '1'));\ Enable('DTR_FAB_CAPT', And(Eq(ValueOf('DTR_CONNECTION'), 'CONNECTION_IO'), 'USE_MODEM'));\ Set('DTR_FAB_CAPT', Or(Neq(ValueOf('DTR_CONNECTION'), 'CONNECTION_IO'), Eq('USE_MODEM', '0')), '0');\ Enable('DTR_GPIO_CAPT', Eq('PARAM_IS_FALSE', '1'));\ Enable('DSR_CONNECTION', Eq('USE_MODEM', '1'));\ Enable('DSR_FAB_CAPT', And(Eq(ValueOf('DSR_CONNECTION'), 'CONNECTION_IO'), 'USE_MODEM'));\ Set('DSR_FAB_CAPT', Or(Neq(ValueOf('DSR_CONNECTION'), 'CONNECTION_IO'), Eq('USE_MODEM', '0')), '0');\ Enable('DSR_GPIO_CAPT', And(Eq(ValueOf('DSR_CONNECTION'), 'CONNECTION_IO'), 'USE_MODEM'));\ Set('DSR_GPIO_CAPT', Or(Neq(ValueOf('DSR_CONNECTION'), 'CONNECTION_IO'), Eq('USE_MODEM', '0')), '0');\ Enable('CTS_CONNECTION', Eq('USE_MODEM', '1'));\ Enable('CTS_FAB_CAPT', And(Eq(ValueOf('CTS_CONNECTION'), 'CONNECTION_IO'), 'USE_MODEM'));\ Set('CTS_FAB_CAPT', Or(Neq(ValueOf('CTS_CONNECTION'), 'CONNECTION_IO'), Eq('USE_MODEM', '0')), '0');\ Enable('CTS_GPIO_CAPT', And(Eq(ValueOf('CTS_CONNECTION'), 'CONNECTION_IO'), 'USE_MODEM'));\ Set('CTS_GPIO_CAPT', Or(Neq(ValueOf('CTS_CONNECTION'), 'CONNECTION_IO'), Eq('USE_MODEM', '0')), '0');\ Enable('RI_CONNECTION', Eq('USE_MODEM', '1'));\ Enable('RI_FAB_CAPT', And(Eq(ValueOf('RI_CONNECTION'), 'CONNECTION_IO'), 'USE_MODEM'));\ Set('RI_FAB_CAPT', Or(Neq(ValueOf('RI_CONNECTION'), 'CONNECTION_IO'), Eq('USE_MODEM', '0')), '0');\ Enable('RI_GPIO_CAPT', And(Eq(ValueOf('RI_CONNECTION'), 'CONNECTION_IO'), 'USE_MODEM'));\ Set('RI_GPIO_CAPT', Or(Neq(ValueOf('RI_CONNECTION'), 'CONNECTION_IO'), Eq('USE_MODEM', '0')), '0');\ Enable('DCD_CONNECTION', Eq('USE_MODEM', '1'));\ Enable('DCD_FAB_CAPT', And(Eq(ValueOf('DCD_CONNECTION'), 'CONNECTION_IO'), 'USE_MODEM'));\ Set('DCD_FAB_CAPT', Or(Neq(ValueOf('DCD_CONNECTION'), 'CONNECTION_IO'), Eq('USE_MODEM', '0')), '0');\ Enable('DCD_GPIO_CAPT', And(Eq(ValueOf('DCD_CONNECTION'), 'CONNECTION_IO'), 'USE_MODEM'));\ Set('DCD_GPIO_CAPT', Or(Neq(ValueOf('DCD_CONNECTION'), 'CONNECTION_IO'), Eq('USE_MODEM', '0')), '0');\
